meanings.definition: In a way that produces a combined effect greater than the sum of their separate effects.
meanings.sent1: The two chemicals reacted synergistically to create a powerful explosion.
meanings.sent2: The team members worked synergistically to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients in the recipe danced synergistically in the pot, creating a delicious aroma.
meanings.sent4: The music and the visuals synergistically enhanced the overall experience of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting blended synergistically, making it a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Working together in a cooperative manner to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The synergistically functioning team easily surpassed their sales targets.
meanings.sent2: The group members were synergistically aligned in their approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized swimmers moved synergistically in the pool, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the machine worked synergistically to ensure smooth operation.
meanings.sent5: The players on the basketball team played synergistically, leading to a championship win.
